pages.text: Unbreakable charms are the upgraded version of fragile ones. They don't break upon death and cannot be burned.$(br2) Equipping and unequipping unbreakable charms deals one point of magic damage.
$(br) To upgrade a fragile charm to an unbreakable one you need to combine these ingredients on the resonance table: $(li)A charm you want to upgrade $(li)A deepslate fragment $(li)A netherite ingot
